note: Other deaths include deaths not attributable to resistance or not assessed for resistance. Deaths can be caused by multiple syndromes. The sum of deaths attributed to each syndrome shown here can exceed the total number of deaths.
title: Neonatal deaths from infections attributed to antimicrobial resistance
subtitle: Estimated number of deaths of [newborns under a month old](#dod:neonatal) from each infection type, broken down by whether they're attributed to antimicrobial resistance.
